entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12 with temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. A few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 12 with temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and periods of light wet snow changing to snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
